text: ceadikkuka: ninnal cinticcuneakkiyittuntea? allahu ninnalute kelviyum kalcayum nastappetuttukayum ninnalute hrdayannalkk mudravekkukayum ceytal allahu allate etu daivaman ninnalkkava vintetutt tarika? neakku, nam ennaneyeakkeyanavarkk telivukal vivariccukeatukkunnatenn. ennittum avar pintirinnupeavukayan
